bibl.title: The Terracotta Figurines from Karanis: A Study of Technique, Style, and Chronology in Fayoumic Coroplastics.
bibl.note: Diss. Univ. of Michigan. Summary in DA 46 (1986) p. 3388-A. A Catalogue provides descriptions of the terracottas and their stratigraphic contexts, and dates the figurines.
Allen Marti Lu, The Terracotta Figurines from Karanis: A Study of Technique, Style, and Chronology in Fayoumic Coroplastics.
